description: With vertical color blocks and an athletic fit, this men’s Merino wool long-sleeved crew is a sharp and practical way to attack your mild-weather outdoor activities. Even as you ramp up your effort, this shirt will ensure your comfort through temperature regulation and increased breathability, and its anti-chafing seam construction will help your skin stay happy. Be sure this shirt is part of your active lifestyle wardrobe!
name: Smartwool Merino Sport (150) LS Crew - Mens
